Beginner.instructions: Clean a CSV file with customer data.

Intermediate.instructions: Perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) on sales data.
environment_setup: Use Jupyter Notebook or Google Colab
constraints: Include visuals with seaborn or matplotlib

Advanced.instructions: Build a dashboard showing key business KPIs.
environment_setup: Use Tableau, PowerBI, or Plotly Dash

Expert.instructions: Build a forecasting model for next quarter's revenue.
